children.value: Deploy Managed Rulesets for a zone in the dashboard
You can enable and configure Managed Rulesets for a zone in the
on the right of a Managed Ruleset to deploy the Managed Ruleset for the current zone.
When you deploy a Managed Ruleset, the WAF adds an
Enable or disable a Managed Ruleset
toggle on the right of a Managed Ruleset to enable or disable it.
Define specific field values for one or more rules (for example, configure a rule with an action different from the action configured by Cloudflare)
To skip one or more rules or WAF Managed Rulesets,
Some Managed Rulesets may not allow custom configuration, depending on your Cloudflare plan.
Configure field values for all the rules
To configure rule field values for all the rules in a Managed Ruleset:
and on the right of the
rule that deploys the Managed Ruleset you want to configure, click
, set one or more rule fields from the available values in the drop-down lists.
For example, select the action to perform for all the rules in the ruleset from the
View the rules of a Managed Ruleset
You can browse the available rules in a Managed Ruleset and search for individual rules or tags.
Use the available filters in the Browse Managed Ruleset interface.
To view the rules of a Managed Ruleset:
and on the right of the
rule that deploys the Managed Ruleset you want to browse, click
The Browse Managed Ruleset interface displays.
Configure a single rule in a Managed Ruleset
You can configure one or more rules in the Browse Managed Ruleset interface.
Search for a rule using the available filters. You can search for tags.
Find the rule you want to configure in the results list.
In the result line for the rule you want to change, select the desired value for a field in the displayed drop-down lists. For example, select the rule action in the
In some Managed Rulesets, you can also change the status of a rule using the toggle available on the right.
The Configure Managed Ruleset interface displays, listing the configuration you just defined.
Configure rules in bulk in a Managed Ruleset
You can configure several rules at once in the Browse Managed Ruleset interface.
Enter search terms in the available input to find the rules you want to configure. You can search for tags.

children.alt: Select tag when browsing a Managed Ruleset

children.value: In the results list, click the checkbox on the left of all the rules you want to configure.
Alternatively, click a tag name under the search input to filter the rules with that tag, and then click the checkboxes for the rules you want to configure.
Update one or more fields for the selected rules using the drop-down lists displayed in the top right corner of the table.

children.alt: Configure Managed Ruleset rules in bulk

children.value: If you selected a tag, you get a dialog asking you if any new rules with the selected tag should be configured with the field values you selected.
Do not apply to new rules
to apply your configurations to the selected rules only.
if you want to apply your configurations to any new rules with the select tag.
